name: The Runaway Feijoão
description:
The Runaway Feijoão is a casual indie game inspired by the old Tom & Jerry (NES) game, bringing you to dificult and addictive gameplay through the human digestive system.
Can you find the way out?

Key Features:

  • 15 Levels.
  • Enemies are parts of the human body and rice?.
  • Play until you escape through the human digestive system and sewer.
